item.title: Make Metaballs
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: The blobby shapes you see in the 37signals logo. They are called metaballs. It’s not a typo. You can’t eat them. It’s a common pattern in logos. The metaball shape is actually very easy to create in any vector software. Here’s how to do it in Illustrator using basic shapes and the Pathfinder tool.
